00036 struct LocalHostSetItem {
00039     LocalHost * _lhpointer;
00040 
00043     typedef LocalHost * key_type;
00046     typedef LocalHost * key_const_reference;
00047 
00050     key_const_reference hashkey() const {
00051         return _lhpointer;
00052     }
00053 
00056     LocalHostSetItem(LocalHost * lhp) : _lhpointer(lhp) {
00057     }
00058 };

00077         return _rhpointer;
00078     }
